.alert-error{display:none}.mage-alert{background-color:#fbedd9;border:1px solid;border-color:#e58a00;border-radius:2px;color:#e58a00;font:16px/1.5 "adobe-clean";padding:16px 35px 12px 50px;position:relative;margin-bottom:20px}.mage-alert .icon{display:block;position:absolute;left:17px;top:50%;margin-top:-11px;width:24px;height:24px}.mage-alert.alert-success,.mage-alert.success-msg{background-color:#dcf3e1;border-color:#0f7d26;color:#0f7d26}.mage-alert.alert-success a:not(.mage-btn),.mage-alert.success-msg a:not(.mage-btn),.mage-alert.alert-success span,.mage-alert.success-msg span{color:#0f7d26;transition:.2s}.mage-alert.alert-success a:not(.mage-btn):hover,.mage-alert.success-msg a:not(.mage-btn):hover,.mage-alert.alert-success span:hover,.mage-alert.success-msg span:hover{color:#12992e}.mage-alert.alert-success .icon,.mage-alert.success-msg .icon{background:url('data:image/svg+xml;base64,')}.mage-alert.alert-info{background-color:#e4f0f8;border-color:#34e709 2;color:#34e709 2}.mage-alert.alert-info a:not(.mage-btn),.mage-alert.alert-info span{color:#34e709 2;transition:.2s}.mage-alert.alert-info a:not(.mage-btn):hover,.mage-alert.alert-info span:hover{color:#3f86b2}.mage-alert.alert-info .icon{background:url('data:image/svg+xml;base64,')}.mage-alert.alert-warning{background-color:#fbedd9;border-color:#c27500;color:#c27500}.mage-alert.alert-warning a:not(.mage-btn),.mage-alert.alert-warning span{color:#c27500;transition:.2s}.mage-alert.alert-warning a:not(.mage-btn):hover,.mage-alert.alert-warning span:hover{color:#e58a00}.mage-alert.alert-warning .icon{background-image:url('data:image/svg+xml;base64,')}.mage-alert.alert-error{background-color:#fae3e2;border-color:#bd3c39;color:#bd3c39}.mage-alert.alert-error a:not(.mage-btn),.mage-alert.alert-error span{color:#bd3c39;transition:.2s}.mage-alert.alert-error a:not(.mage-btn):hover,.mage-alert.alert-error span:hover{color:#df4743}.mage-alert.alert-error .icon{background-image:url('data:image/svg+xml;base64,')}.mage-alert a:not(.mage-btn){font:500 16px/1.5 "adobe-clean"}.mage-alert ul,.mage-alert li{margin:0;padding:0;background:none;border:0}.mage-tooltip{display:inline-block;font-size:20px}.mage-tooltip.red{color:#df4743}.mage-tooltip.red:hover{color:#bd3c39}.mage-tooltip.green{color:#12992e}.mage-tooltip.green:hover{color:#0f7d26}.mage-tooltip.gray{color:#e3e3e3}.mage-tooltip.gray:hover{color:#e3e3e3}
